original_text: And whereas thou sawest iron mixed with miry clay, they shall mingle themselves with the seed of men: but they shall not cleave one to another, even as iron is not mixed with clay.
korean_text: 왕께서 쇠와 진흙이 섞인 것을 보셨은즉 그들이 다른 민족과 서로 섞일 것이나 그들이 피차에 합하지 아니함이 쇠와 진흙이 합하지 않음과 같으리이다

sentences.original_text: And whereas thou sawest iron mixed with miry clay,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네가 쇠와 진흙이 섞인 것을 보았으니,

sentences.original_text: they shall mingle themselves with the seed of men:
but they shall not cleave one to another,
even as iron is not mixed with clay.
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 쇠가 진흙과 섞이지 못함과 같으니라
